title: System Design Practical Competency Strengthening: Job-Based Collaborative Learning Program for Surgical Site Infection Prevention

context.prior_knowledge: Basic operating room infection control procedures and medical terminology comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: One can explain infection prevention protocols for pre-, intra-, and post-operative phases with 90% accuracy.
By dividing roles among team members, one can analyze infection risk scenarios based on real cases at least three times and derive solutions.
Through project deliverables, one can present strategies for reducing surgical site infection rates with a completeness standard of over 80%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
